problem_text_en:
In the figure shown above, the left container has radius of 3. If all the water in the right container is poured into the left container, the water level rises from $h$ inches to $(h+x)$ inches. Which of the following is the best approximation of the value of $x$ ? A. 3
 B. 3.4
 C. 3.8
 D. 4.2
